code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:patient presents with 2 years history of mild abdominal pain, mild vertigo. patient reports mild diarrhea. pt is a white m aged 28 years. o:Height 66 in, Weight 234 lbs, Temperature 99 F, Pulse 88, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 77, Respiration 18, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = mild tenderness a:Nausea p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed prochlorperazine - 40 mg daily (oral dose), and ordered Basic Metabolic Panel.

s:28 yo white male athlete presents with 6 days history of mild vertigo, mild diarrhea and mild abdominal pain. o:Height 66 in, Weight 231 lbs, Temperature 98.5 F, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = mild tenderness a:Nausea p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed prochlorperazine - 40 mg daily (oral dose), and ordered CBC.
Do not IV Fluid and Support
